entry.title: Toefl Test I Took.
entry.content:
This is my first time to take Toefl Test. After I graduated and left the camp. I prepared for the toefl test. But I didn’t prepared it well. I even not finished the one whole office guide test. It is really a pity. Wahtever, the porpose I take it is just verified my English skill, although the scores did not public, but the I achive the porpose, my English-skill is bad.

What I need do is learning and practicing.

The 4 parts in toefl, I nearlly did not finished one of them well.

In Reading Section, After I finished the first one, I found I did not have enought time . And I feel nervous, and you know, many answers are guessed by me.

And the listening section, what I pay the muchest time to practice, but what I can understand is just a little. And I was too tired to concentrate on the convesations or lecture. This is a lesson, when you take the test, you must sleep well and enough.

Then it is speaking, I found I can not read the paragraphes on time. As for the questions about speaking by oneself, I could not prepare them well in 15 seconds. I need to practice thinking in the heart with English.

What is the last is Writing Section. Maybe it will gave me the best score in 4 parts. But you know, they are still not good articles, it’s just like an articles that writen by a pupil. not like an article by a high school graduation.

What I need to practice and learn is very much.
